Realistic Text

You may click here and type to edit the contents of this text. This silly effect is accomplished using mostly Cascading Style Sheets, or CSS for short. The trick is overlaying three or more slightly transparent objects and using slightly different rotations for each. In this case, the variation between each is 0.3 degrees. This paragraph is full of unnecessary words, just to make it nice looking. Made by Lucas Bebber. You can look at my CodePen profile (@lbebber) to see other stuff I made.
